definitions.definition: Pertaining to or composed of nitre ; having the properties of nitre, bitter .
Of, relating to, or derived from nitrogen , especially in which the valence of the nitrogen is lower than that of a corresponding nitric species.
Of or relating to nitrous acid or its derivatives.
Having a sharp odor like ammonia or nitric acid .

main_definition: ( now historical ) Pertaining to or composed of nitre ; having the properties of nitre, bitter . [from 16th c.]
secondary_definitions: ( chemistry ) Of, relating to, or derived from nitrogen , especially in which the valence of the nitrogen is lower than that of a corresponding nitric species. [from 17th c.]
( chemistry ) Of or relating to nitrous acid or its derivatives.
( mycology , biology ) Having a sharp odor like ammonia or nitric acid .
